template.name: nkimportlayer1
template.description: Space import for the urn:org:netkernel:ext:layer1 library

template.name: nkimporthds
template.description: Space import for the urn:org:netkernel:mod:hds HDS rootspace (private)

template.name: nkimportxml
template.description: Space import for the urn:org:netkernel:xml:core library

template.name: nkmapper
template.value: <mapper> <config> <endpoint> <name>Mapper Endpoint</name> <description>Example mapper overlay endpoint</description> <verbs>SOURCE</verbs> <grammar> <active> <identifier>active:foo</identifier> <argument name="bar" min="1" max="1" desc="an argument" /> </active> </grammar> <request> <identifier>res:/dummy</identifier> </request> </endpoint> </config> <space> <literal type="string" uri="res:/dummy">Example wrapped endpoint</literal> </space> </mapper>

template.name: nkaccessor
template.description: Accessor endpoint declaration with active grammar

template.name: nkmodule
template.value:
<module version="2.0"> <meta> <identity> <uri>urn:example</uri> <version>1.0.0</version> </identity> <info> <name>Example Module</name> <description>Example Module</description> </info> </meta>
<system> <dynamic/> </system>
<rootspace name="example space" public="true" uri="urn:example:main">
</rootspace>
</module>
template.description: Initial NetKernel module.xml with one empty rootspace declaration

template.name: nkmetatodo
template.value: <meta> <todo progress="${cursor}50" owner="me"> ==Install the ToDo Tool== *'''Finish the todo tool!''' *Go and try it [http://localhost:1060/tools/meta/todo|here] </todo> </meta>
template.description: Metadata template for the NK TODO application (install meta-todo from Apposite)
